snippet.title: Ocean Survivors | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Set your sails for an action-packed, naval-combat roguelite where you captain a pirate ship. Sink waves of enemies, dodge cannonballs and upgrade your ship in this top-down shooter. Wreak havoc with your ultimate ship and plunder their treasure to become the fiercest pirate of the seas!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3225320/Ocean_Survivors/

Twitch:     https://www.twitch.tv/aremjigames
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/aremjigames.bsky.social
Instagram:    https://www.instagram.com/aremjigames/

Itch:    https://aremji-games.itch.io/
Support Me On Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/aremji

#oceansurvivors #indiegame #gamedev #unity #unity
